article.title: Status and history for deu_1996
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: Two typos: “Forschritt” corrected to “Fortschritt” and “Staatsanghörigkeit” corrected to “Staatsangehörigkeit”, thanks to Roey Horns. Added two missing commas and removed and extra comma, thanks to Otto Stolz.
“einschließlich” requires the genitive. Thanks to Asmus Freytag.
Stage 4: initial version in provided by Otto Stolz.
